title: Automated Self-Supervised Learning for Recommendation. (arXiv:2303.07797v2 [cs.IR] UPDATED)
abstract: Graph neural networks (GNNs) have emerged as the state-of-the-art paradigm for collaborative filtering (CF). To improve the representation quality over limited labeled data, contrastive learning has attracted attention in recommendation and benefited graph-based CF model recently. However, the success of most contrastive methods heavily relies on manually generating effective contrastive views for heuristic-based data augmentation. This does not generalize across different datasets and downstream recommendation tasks, which is difficult to be adaptive for data augmentation and robust to noise perturbation. To fill this crucial gap, this work proposes a unified Automated Collaborative Filtering (AutoCF) to automatically perform data augmentation for recommendation. Specifically, we focus on the generative self-supervised learning framework with a learnable augmentation paradigm that benefits the automated distillation of important self-supervised signals. translated_title: 自动自监督学习推荐系统
translated_abstract: 图神经网络已成为协同过滤的最先进方法。为了提高在有限标注数据上的表现，对比学习吸引了人们的关注，受益于图形协同过滤模型。然而，大多数对比方法的成功与手动生成有效对比视图来执行启发式数据增强密切相关，这不利于在不同数据集和下游推荐任务中泛化，也难以适应于数据增强和噪声扰动的鲁棒性。为了填补这一重要缺口，本文提出了一个统一的自动协同过滤系统（AutoCF），以自动执行推荐的数据增强。具体而言，我们专注于具有可学习增强范式的生成自监督学习框架，这有助于重要自监督信号的自动精馏。
tldr: 本论文提出了一个名为AutoCF的自动推荐系统，它使用生成性自监督学习框架和可学习数据增强范式进行数据增强，以提高推荐系统的表现。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an automatic recommendation system called AutoCF, which utilizes a generative self-supervised learning framework and a learnable data augmentation paradigm to improve the performance of recommendation systems.
